snippet: The highly unusual meeting was intended, according to organizers, to forge a joint effort against religious violence, and to promote peace and coexistence....
abstract: Covert meeting held at Israeli Pres Reuven Rivlin's home between range of Muslim and Jewish leaders yields joint statement condemning killing of innocent people, regardless of their religion; conveners of highly unusual meeting hoped to imbue calls for peace between Israelis and Palestinians with spiritual authority.

byline.contributor: Rami Nazzal contributed reporting from Ramallah, West Bank.

lead_paragraph: The highly unusual meeting was intended, according to organizers, to forge a joint effort against religious violence, and to promote peace and coexistence.

headline.main: Israeli President Hosts Quiet Meeting of Muslim and Jewish Leaders
headline.print_headline: Muslim and Jewish Leaders Meet Quietly in Israel
